data_table.description: MESA Lung Airway Ancillary Study MESA Family Dataset: This dataset provides airway measurement data for MESA Family participants enrolled in the MESA Lung Airway Ancillary Study.

variable.name: inner_diameter
variable.description: Inner diameter of largest airway in lower third of lung

variable.name: wall_thickness
variable.description: Wall thickness (outer diameter - inner diameter) of largest airway in lower third of lung

variable.name: left_or_right
variable.description: Is this airway on the left or right side of the lung?

variable.name: up_or_mid_or_low
variable.description: Is this airway in the upper, middle or lower third of the lung?

variable.name: core_or_peel
variable.description: Is this airway in the 'core' or 'peel' area of the lung?

variable.name: wa_pct
variable.description: Area of wall as a percent of area of airway (from outer diameter)

variable.name: b0_sqrt_wall_area
variable.description: Intercept from a model predicting SQRT of wall area from inner_diameter (labelled 'intercept')

variable.name: b1_sqrt_wall_area
variable.description: Slope from a model predicting SQRT of wall area from inner_diameter (labelled 'inner_diameter')
